data.name: Jonathan Walters
data.motivation: The team was very supportive and kept me motivated
data.ocupation: “ I started as a total newbie with virtually no coding skills. I now work as a mobile engineer for a big company. This was one of the best investments I’ve made in myself. ”Jonathan Walters
